name: 劉世芸
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
schedule:
1.  Topic sentences 
2.  Paragraph outlines
3.  prewriting, writing, revising and editing paragraphs 
4.  narration 
5.  (cont.) 
6.  description 
7.  (cont.) 
8.  peer discussion 
9.  mid-term exam 
10.  cause and effect 
11. (cont.) 
12.  analysis by division 
13.  (cont.) 
14.  wordiness, reducdancy, vagueness: diction 
15.  comparision and contrast 
16.  (cont.) 
17.  definition: claryfying terms 
18.  final exam
scorePolicy:
1.  writing papers  60%  
2.  full attendance 5% 
3.  class participation 25% 
4.  quizzes and tests 10%
materials:
At a Glance: Paragraphs
